name: Pew Pew (billycombo)
description:
Aim: Jump around the platforms and shoot the evil squares to gain points, collect power-ups to help improve your chance of survival!

Controls: Jump / Double Jump - Space, Right - D, Left - A, Shoot - Left Click

Made this in three days don't bully, also first game I've made that I'm publishing.

Construction criticism, bugs reports, etc are greatly apreciated.

Thankyou.
